abstract: David Phillips provides our first Saturday challenge of 2016.
snippet: David Phillips provides our first Saturday challenge of 2016.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY PUZZLE — Some puzzle constructors are attracted to a marquee phrase as their seed entry and some constructors can’t resist the Scrabbly allure of the rarer letters of the alphabet when selecting a place to start filling their themeless grids. Today, David Phillips shows us what it’s like to fall for the allure of the letter X.
